snippet.title: ✅  Amber was 'smothered, slapped & suffocated' in 'violent night' with Johnny Depp
snippet.description:
💖 Please Visit: https://www.facebook.com/Scathc/
💖 Please Subscribe: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCQju4Bo1Tjk9SzhHQDknWaw?sub_confirmation=1
✍  Amber Heard has told a court she was "smothered", "slapped" and "suffocated" in the "most violent night" of her relationship with .    Heard, 34, has returned to London's High Court for her third day giving evidence in Depp 's libel case against News Group Newspapers.  Depp, 57, is suing NGN over a story published in The Sun in 201 which branded him a "wife beater" - a claim which he strenuously denies.  During today's testimony, the actress was questioned about a heated row with Depp on the night of their Thanksgiving bash at their Los Angeles home on November 26 2015.  Heard told the court it was "one of the worst and most violent nights of our relationship".  She claimed he was high on drugs, telling the court: "We were in our place in LA. Johnny was using a lot of drugs at the time, especiy cocaine and weed, which he was pretty much constantly smoking.   "We got into a fight on Thanksgiving, where Johnny ripped my shirt and threw me across the room. He threw a wine glass and a hea ...
💖 #JohnnyDepp, #PiratesoftheCaribbean, #AmberHeard
